text: Loitongbam is a Meetei Manipuri surname or family name which has Indian origin. People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India.http://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/surname.aspx?surname=Loitongbamhttp://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/originoffamilyname.aspx?surname=Loitongbam == References == Category:Meitei surnames
title: Loitongbam
